description.value:
Your touch soothes the body or mind. You can cast lay on hands targeting a living creature using 2 actions instead of 1. If you do, you can attempt to counteract one condition of your choice affecting the target. When you select this feat, choose one of the following options, which determines the conditions you can choose:

  • Mercy of the Body @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened];

  • Mercy of Grace @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed];

  • Mercy of the Mind @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied].

Special You can select this feat up to three times. Each time, choose a different type of mercy and add its options to those you can choose when you cast a 2-action lay on hands.
